sn48.47:1.2: “Mendicants, how many faculties must a mendicant develop and cultivate so that they can declare enlightenment:
sn48.47:1.3: ‘I understand: “Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence”’?”
sn48.47:2.1: “Our teachings are rooted in the Buddha. …”
sn48.47:2.2: “A mendicant must develop and cultivate four faculties so that they can declare enlightenment.
sn48.47:2.5: The faculties of energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
sn48.47:2.6: These are the four faculties that a mendicant must develop and cultivate so that they can declare enlightenment:
sn48.47:2.7: ‘I understand: “Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence”’.”
